Line17.6DE47: There’s a shrine west of here, bears a relic. I’m told it takes on your sin. Weighs you down, body and soul. Beats the hell out of you. It’ll cleanse you, prepare you to stand before the Father.
Line19.6DE47: I hope you don’t have many regrets, friend. This kind of thing is a lot deadlier for some than others. Watch out, alright? I'll find you at the end.
MenuLabel: “What must I do for the pilgrimage?”
